00020 #ifndef STANDARD_QUEUE_H
00021 #define STANDARD_QUEUE_H
00022 
00023 #include "../solver.h"
00024 #include "../get_info/get_info.h"
00025 #include "../constraints/triggers.h"
00026 #include "../constraints/constraint_abstract.h"
00027 #include "TriggerBacktrackQueue.h"
00028 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00029 #include <queue>
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 class Queues
00033 {
00034   StateObj* stateObj;
00035 
00036 
00037 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00038   priority_queue<TriggerRange> propagate_trigger_list;
00039 #else
00040   vector<TriggerRange> propagate_trigger_list;
00041 #endif
00042   vector<DynamicTrigger*> dynamic_trigger_list;
00043 
00044   // Special triggers are those which can only be run while the
00045   // normal queue is empty. This list is at the moment only used
00046   // by reified constraints when they want to start propagation.
00047   // I don't like it, but it is necesasary.
00048   vector<AbstractConstraint*> special_triggers;
00049 
00050 #ifndef NO_DYN_CHECK
00051   DynamicTrigger* next_queue_ptr;
00052 #endif
00053 
00054   TriggerBacktrackQueue tbq;
00055 public:
00056 
00057   TriggerBacktrackQueue& getTbq()
00058   { return tbq; }
00059 
00060   DynamicTrigger*& getNextQueuePtrRef() { return next_queue_ptr; }
00061 
00062   Queues(StateObj* _stateObj) : stateObj(_stateObj), next_queue_ptr(NULL)
00063   {}
00064 
00065   void pushSpecialTrigger(AbstractConstraint* trigger)
00066   {
00067       CON_INFO_ADDONE(AddSpecialToQueue);
00068       special_triggers.push_back(trigger);
00069   }
00070 
00071 
00072   inline void pushTriggers(TriggerRange new_triggers)
00073   {
00074     CON_INFO_ADDONE(AddConToQueue);
00075 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00076     propagate_trigger_list.push(new_triggers);
00077 #else
00078     propagate_trigger_list.push_back(new_triggers);
00079 #endif
00080   }
00081 
00082   void pushDynamicTriggers(DynamicTrigger* new_dynamic_trig_range)
00083   {
00084     CON_INFO_ADDONE(AddDynToQueue);
00085     D_ASSERT(new_dynamic_trig_range->sanity_check_list());
00086     dynamic_trigger_list.push_back(new_dynamic_trig_range);
00087   }
00088 
00089 
00090   void clearQueues()
00091   {
00092 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00093     while(!propagate_trigger_list.empty()) {
00094       propagate_trigger_list.pop();
00095     }
00096 #else
00097     propagate_trigger_list.clear();
00098 #endif
00099     dynamic_trigger_list.clear();
00100 
00101     if(!special_triggers.empty())
00102     {
00103       int size = special_triggers.size();
00104       for(int i = 0; i < size; ++i)
00105         special_triggers[i]->special_unlock();
00106       special_triggers.clear();
00107     }
00108   }
00109 
00110   bool isQueuesEmpty()
00111   {
00112     return propagate_trigger_list.empty() && dynamic_trigger_list.empty() &&
00113     special_triggers.empty();
00114   }
00115 
00116 
00117   // next_queue_ptr is defined in constraint_dynamic.
00118   // It is used if pointers are moved around.
00119 
00120   // Subclass this class and change the following three methods.
00121 
00122   bool propagateDynamicTriggerLists()
00123   {
00124     bool* fail_ptr = getState(stateObj).getFailedPtr();
00125     while(!dynamic_trigger_list.empty())
00126     {
00127       DynamicTrigger* t = dynamic_trigger_list.back();
00128       dynamic_trigger_list.pop_back();
00129       DynamicTrigger* it = t->next;
00130 
00131       while(it != t)
00132       {
00133         if(*fail_ptr)
00134         {
00135           clearQueues();
00136           return true;
00137         }
00138 
00139 #ifdef NO_DYN_CHECK
00140         DynamicTrigger* next_queue_ptr;
00141 #endif
00142         next_queue_ptr = it->next;
00143         CON_INFO_ADDONE(DynamicTrigger);
00144         it->propagate();
00145 
00146 #ifdef WDEG
00147         if(getOptions(stateObj).wdeg_on && *fail_ptr)
00148           it->constraint->incWdeg();
00149 #endif
00150         it = next_queue_ptr;
00151       }
00152     }
00153     return false;
00154   }
00155 
00156   bool propagateStaticTriggerLists()
00157   {
00158     bool* fail_ptr = getState(stateObj).getFailedPtr();
00159     while(!propagate_trigger_list.empty())
00160     {
00161 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00162       TriggerRange t = propagate_trigger_list.top();
00163       int data_val = t.data;
00164       propagate_trigger_list.pop();
00165 #else
00166       TriggerRange t = propagate_trigger_list.back();
00167       int data_val = t.data;
00168       propagate_trigger_list.pop_back();
00169 #endif
00170 
00171       for(Trigger* it = t.begin(); it != t.end(); it++)
00172       {
00173         if(*fail_ptr)
00174         {
00175           clearQueues();
00176           return true;
00177         }
00178 
00179 #ifndef NO_DEBUG
00180         if(getOptions(stateObj).fullpropagate)
00181           it->full_propagate();
00182         else
00183         {
00184           CON_INFO_ADDONE(StaticTrigger);
00185           it->propagate(data_val);
00186         }
00187 #else
00188         {
00189           CON_INFO_ADDONE(StaticTrigger);
00190           it->propagate(data_val);
00191         }
00192 #endif
00193 #ifdef WDEG
00194         if(getOptions(stateObj).wdeg_on && *fail_ptr)
00195           it->constraint->incWdeg();
00196 #endif
00197       }
00198     }
00199 
00200     return false;
00201   }
00202 
00203   inline void propagateQueue()
00204   {
00205     while(true)
00206     {
00207       if (getState(stateObj).isDynamicTriggersUsed())
00208       {
00209         while(!propagate_trigger_list.empty() || !dynamic_trigger_list.empty())
00210         {
00211           if(propagateDynamicTriggerLists())
00212             return;
00213 
00214           /* Don't like code duplication here but a slight efficiency gain */
00215           if(propagateStaticTriggerLists())
00216             return;
00217         }
00218       }
00219       else
00220       {
00221         if(propagateStaticTriggerLists())
00222           return;
00223       }
00224 
00225       if(special_triggers.empty())
00226         return;
00227 
00228       AbstractConstraint* trig = special_triggers.back();
00229       special_triggers.pop_back();
00230       CON_INFO_ADDONE(SpecialTrigger);
00231       trig->special_check();
00232 #ifdef WDEG
00233       if(getOptions(stateObj).wdeg_on && getState(stateObj).isFailed()) trig->incWdeg();
00234 #endif
00235     } // while(true)
00236 
00237   } // end Function
00238 
00239 // ******************************************************************************************
00240 // Second copy of the propagate queue methods, adapted for the root node only.
00241 
00242   bool propagateDynamicTriggerListsRoot()
00243   {
00244     bool* fail_ptr = getState(stateObj).getFailedPtr();
00245     while(!dynamic_trigger_list.empty())
00246     {
00247       DynamicTrigger* t = dynamic_trigger_list.back();
00248       dynamic_trigger_list.pop_back();
00249       DynamicTrigger* it = t->next;
00250 
00251       while(it != t)
00252       {
00253         if(*fail_ptr)
00254         {
00255           clearQueues();
00256           return true;
00257         }
00258 
00259 #ifdef NO_DYN_CHECK
00260         DynamicTrigger* next_queue_ptr;
00261 #endif
00262         next_queue_ptr = it->next;
00263 
00264         if(it->constraint->full_propagate_done)
00265         {
00266             CON_INFO_ADDONE(DynamicTrigger);
00267             it->propagate();
00268         }
00269 
00270         it = next_queue_ptr;
00271       }
00272     }
00273     return false;
00274   }
00275 
00276   bool propagateStaticTriggerListsRoot()
00277   {
00278     bool* fail_ptr = getState(stateObj).getFailedPtr();
00279     while(!propagate_trigger_list.empty())
00280     {
00281 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00282       TriggerRange t = propagate_trigger_list.top();
00283       int data_val = t.data;
00284       propagate_trigger_list.pop();
00285 #else
00286       TriggerRange t = propagate_trigger_list.back();
00287       int data_val = t.data;
00288       propagate_trigger_list.pop_back();
00289 #endif
00290 
00291       for(Trigger* it = t.begin(); it != t.end(); it++)
00292       {
00293         if(*fail_ptr)
00294         {
00295           clearQueues();
00296           return true;
00297         }
00298         if(it->constraint->full_propagate_done)
00299         {
00300 #ifndef NO_DEBUG
00301         if(getOptions(stateObj).fullpropagate)
00302           it->full_propagate();
00303         else
00304         {
00305           CON_INFO_ADDONE(StaticTrigger);
00306           it->propagate(data_val);
00307         }
00308 #else
00309         {
00310           CON_INFO_ADDONE(StaticTrigger);
00311           it->propagate(data_val);
00312         }
00313 #endif
00314         }
00315       }
00316     }
00317 
00318     return false;
00319   }
00320 
00321   inline void propagateQueueRoot()
00322   {
00323     while(true)
00324     {
00325       if (getState(stateObj).isDynamicTriggersUsed())
00326       {
00327         while(!propagate_trigger_list.empty() || !dynamic_trigger_list.empty())
00328         {
00329           if(propagateDynamicTriggerListsRoot())
00330             return;
00331 
00332           /* Don't like code duplication here but a slight efficiency gain */
00333           if(propagateStaticTriggerListsRoot())
00334             return;
00335         }
00336       }
00337       else
00338       {
00339         if(propagateStaticTriggerListsRoot())
00340           return;
00341       }
00342 
00343       if(special_triggers.empty())
00344         return;
00345 
00346       AbstractConstraint* trig = special_triggers.back();
00347       special_triggers.pop_back();
00348       CON_INFO_ADDONE(SpecialTrigger);
00349       trig->special_check();
00350 
00351     } // while(true)
00352 
00353   } // end Function
00354 };
